short_summary: SAFETY RELIEF VALVE DELIVERIES TO CFB ESQUIMALT AND CFB HALIFAX
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.Item 1, GSIN: 4820, NSN: 01-371-0927, VALVE, SAFETY RELIEFPart No.: 1385-2385C227, NCAGE: 12501Quantity: 9, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt.Item 2, GSIN: 4820, NSN: 01-371-0927, VALVE, SAFETY RELIEFPart No.: 1385-2385C227, NCAGE: 12501Quantity: 9, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax.Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title**: [Public Works and Government Services Canada] VALVE, SAFETY RELIEF

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01015126
-----------------------------------------

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

**Solicitation Number**: W8482-231084/A
------------------------------------

**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-01-09T14:00:00

**Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for Safety Relief Valves. Two lots are requested:
- **Lot 1**: 9 units to be delivered to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt
- **Lot 2**: 9 units to be delivered to CFB Halifax

**Product Specifications**:
* GSIN: 4820, NSN: 01-371-0927
* Part Number: 1385-2385C227, NCAGE: 12501
* Unit of Issue: EA

**Trade Agreements**:
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity**: Unspecified

**Regions of Delivery**: Nova Scotia, British Columbia

**Contracting Entity**:
* Department of National Defence
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

**Contact Information**:
* Name: Jean-Pierre Normandin
* Email: jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 819-939-3674

**Languages**:
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Required Documents**:
Find the full request for proposal at CanadaBuys: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/29/1289218dfaff0e88f05866851a34fac2/rfp_w8482-231084-a-en.pdf> (English)
<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/29/2a64c1ffa609f9b031e213c45a269a15/rfp_w8482-231084-a-fr.pdf> (French)
